 Deduction from equality to equivalence of membership.  (Contributed by NM, 27-Dec-1993.)
statement:
eleq1d.1 $e |- ( ph -> A = B ) $.
eleq2d $p |- ( ph -> ( C e. A <-> C e. B ) ) $.
